review: A lot of bang for your money. Worth the price just to have everything in one place. Nice to have Plex and Pluto apps already there too. Installation was easy enough. Bluetooth remote is great, hardest thing to do is get used to NOT pointing the remote at tv.The usb on tv didn't supply enough power for stick. So had to plug it into outlet for correct voltage. Not really an issue .
author: MetalMike

review: I love the fire stick! Super easy to use and stream other apps! I wish it streamed vudu, but other than that, works great and meets our needs.
